title: Contact form
desc: Do you have a question about our application or an existing problem? We are happy to help you. Please fill out the form completely so that we know what it is about.
referProblem: What does the problem refer to?
privacy: By submitting this form, you agree that we may temporarily store the transmitted personal data for the purpose of contacting you. You can find more information about this in our privacy policy.
feedbackTxt: Thank you, We have received your request and will get back to you soon.
fillAllFields: Please fill in all fields correctly.
